s140_nrf52840_5.0.0-3.alpha

This release consists of the following:

- This readme file
- The s140_nrf52840_5.0.0-3.alpha API (SoftDevice header files)
- The s140_nrf52840_5.0.0-3.alpha license agreement
- The s140_nrf52840_5.0.0-3.alpha release notes
- The s140_nrf52840_5.0.0-3.alpha SoftDevice (binary hex file)
- The s140_nrf52840_5.0.0-3.alpha Migration Document
- Modified SDK code and example (see readme.md inside zip)
  ble_app_att_mtu_throughput_example_connecting_on_long_range.zip
